entry.title: Re 8/ The collection was originally planned to drop as a Dutch Auction format for sale In this type of auction, the mint price gradually falls over ti...
entry.summary: Re 8/ The collection was originally planned to drop as a Dutch Auction format for sale In this type of auction, the mint price gradually falls over time, but they declared that these auctions were BS OthersideMeta: Dutch auctions are actually bullshit, so Otherdeeds will be sold for a flat price of 305 ApeCoin 🧵.
